title: Binky Felstead looks gorgeous in a stunning red tired dress at the Maleficent premiere in London
text:
She shares her busy life as a mum and business owner with her 1.4m Instagram followers.

And Binky Felstead gave her fans a glimpse at the more glam side of her day on Wednesday as she walked the red carpet for the Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil premiere in London.

The ex Made In Chelsea star looked gorgeous in a red Anna Mason dress for the star-studded European premiere of the new Disney movie.

Stunning: Binky Felstead gave her fans a glimpse at the more glam side of her day on Wednesday as she walked the red carpet for the Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil premiere

Binky, 29, pulled out all the stops for the a-list evening, choosing a stunning scarlet dress.

The dress showed off the reality star's svelte figure with its nipped in waist flowing down to a tiered skirt.

She accessorised like a pro with grey snakeskin heels and a slick of Charlotte Tilbury red lippie, perfectly coordinated with the shade of her dress.

Flawless: Binky, 29, pulled out all the stops for the glam evening, choosing a stunning scarlet dress for the European premiere of the new Disney film

Binky gushed about her fun night out on Instagram on Thursday morning, telling her fans: 'Well Maleficent Mistress Of Evil premier was amazing. Was so excited to see Angelina Jolie in person as I have always said she is the most beautiful woman in the world and she really is!!!'

Binky juggles a busy life as mum to her daughter India, two, who she co-parents with ex boyfriend Josh Patterson.

The ex MIC favourite set up her business Mummy Tribe after becoming a mother, hosting retreats for new mums and their children with a focus on fitness and mental health as well as offering on-site childcare and parenting tips.

Ready for her close up: She accessorised like a pro with grey snakeskin heels and a slick of Charlotte Tilbury red lippie, perfectly coordinated with the shade of her dress

It's been an exciting year for the beauty when it comes to her love life too, as she made her first public appearance with new man Max Fredrik Darnton at the launch of Gordon Ramsey's new restaurant Lucky Cat last month.

Binky appeared to have remained single since her split from Josh last September and had not previously announced any love interest.

During their relationship Binky and Josh welcomed India, but subsequently split when they realised they were better off as friends.
description: The ex Made In Chelsea star looked gorgeous in a red Anna Mason dress for the star-studded European premiere of the new Disney movie.
